name: Ace Harding: Lost in Las Vegas
overview: Ace Harding: Lost in Las Vegas is the sequel to Kemco's point-and-click adventure game, Déjà Vu, about an amnesiac detective trying to remember his identity. It was later released for the Game Boy Color as part of Déjà Vu and Déjà Vu II: The Casebooks of Ace Harding. No prototypes of this game have surfaced so far.
